data.eml:eml: On the morphology and classification of larval water mites (Hydrachnidia, Acari) from springs in Luxembourg

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martin, Peter (2006): On the morphology and classification of larval water mites (Hydrachnidia, Acari) from springs in Luxembourg. Zootaxa 1138: 1-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172007
